model_id: Canon LBP 7100Cn A4 Size Colour Laser Printer
title: Canon LBP 7100Cn A4 Size Colour Laser Printer
summary: Networkable A4 laser printer that offers up to 14ppm in both colour and black and white.Print, Wired LANPrint speed (A4; Mono / Colour): up to to 14ppmFPOT (A4): 18secs.
